title: 服务器自动公告不会设置求帮助
txt_content:
装了个自动公告插件 不会用 打开配置文件 看不懂 求大神帮我修改下   

改成每1分钟出：
&c禁止-&5高空流水 高空岩浆 盗窃 破坏 高频红石
&c禁止-&5向OP索要物品及创世
&c禁止-&5未经对方允许在别人区域建造东西'
&c广告-&2购买VIP联系腐竹-XX
&c公告-&2服务器唯一YY：XXXXXXXX





#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  AutoMessage Configuration File
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  Message Configuration:
#     Messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the \n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     For a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     If you are unfamiliar with YAML use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  default:
    enabled: true
    random: false
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: '[&bPrefix&r] '
    suffix: '[&4Suffix&r]'
    messages:
    - '&1First&r message \nin the default list!'
    - '&2Second&r message \nin the default list!'
    - '&3Third&r message \nin the default list!'
    - 'These messages will be displayed to users with \nautomessage.receive.default!'
  vip:
    enabled: true
    random: false
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: '[&bPrefix&r]\n'
    suffix: '\n[&4Suffix&r] '
    messages:
    - 'This message will be displayed only to users with \nautomessage.receive.vip!'

replies.author: uuz
replies.txt_content:
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  AutoMessage Configuration File
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  Message Configuration:
#     Messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the \n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     For a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     If you are unfamiliar with YAML use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  vip:
    enabled: false
    interval: 30
    expiry: -1
    random: false
    prefix: '[&bPrefix&r]\n'
    suffix: '\n[&4Suffix&r] '
    messages:
    - This message will be displayed only to users with \nautomessage.receive.vip!
  default:
    enabled: true
    interval: 60
    expiry: -1
    random: false
    prefix: '[&b系统公告&f] '
    suffix: ''
    messages:
    - '&c禁止-&5高空流水 高空岩浆 盗窃 破坏 高频红石'
    - '&c禁止-&5向OP索要物品及创世'
    - '&c禁止-&5未经对方允许在别人区域建造东西'
    - '&c广告-&2购买VIP联系腐竹-XX'
    - '&c公告-&2服务器唯一YY：XXXXXXXX'
复制代码中文部分XXXX自己修改吧

#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  AutoMessage Configuration File
#  ----------------------------------------------------
#  Message Configuration:
#     Messages are handled in lists to allow for advanced customization!
#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the \n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
#     For a complete tutorial go to http://dev.bukkit.org/server-mods/automessage.
#     If you are unfamiliar with YAML use the in-game commands: /am help

settings:
  enabled: true
  min-players: 0
  log-to-console: false
message-lists:
  default:
    enabled: true
    random: false
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: '[&bPrefix&r] '
    suffix: '[&4Suffix&r]'
    messages:
    - &c禁止-&5高空流水 高空岩浆 盗窃 破坏 高频红石
    -&c禁止-&5向OP索要物品及创世
    -&c禁止-&5未经对方允许在别人区域建造东西'
    -&c广告-&2购买VIP联系腐竹-XX
    -&c公告-&2服务器唯一YY：XXXXXXXX
  vip:
    enabled: true
    random: false
    interval: 45
    expiry: -1
    prefix: '[&bPrefix&r]\n'
    suffix: '\n[&4Suffix&r] '
    messages:
    - 'This message will be displayed only to users with \nautomessage.receive.vip!'

uuz 发表于 2014-2-23 07:28
中文部分XXXX自己修改吧
亲 可以搞成只有一条公告的么···   就是那些搞成一条广告   有回城（分行）

#     Feel free to add color codes by using & in your messages!
#     To split a message onto multiple lines use the \n delimiter!
#     Lines starting with / will be run as a command!
#     To add single apostrophes into a message use ''.
